course_description: Second of two professional development courses focusing on "soft" skills necessary for a successful career in professional accounting career. This course further develops students' written communication and Excel skills, and reviews the ethics and core values of the CPA profession by examining the key requirements of the AICPA Code of Professional Conduct. This is a self-study course required for BBA/MPA dual-degree students.
